attributes.action: reducing the deficit is easy. just end overseas aid and stop engaging in overseas conflicts
attributes.additional_details: it is appalling for the government to continually take from and break its own people in the name of reducing the deficit whilst simultaneously engaging in continual conflicts overseas which are not endorsed by the british people, as well as giving away endless amounts in overseas aid to corrupt governments of countries who should be left to manage their own affairs. it is time we adopted a policy of non-interference in the affairs of other countries to allow them to determine the path of their own futures, and to benefit the people of this country by making us less of a target for terrorism and increasing the the level of investment in our own future.
